# Text capability Reference

Animate objects. [Read more explanations about it.](/gdevelop5/objects)



## Text capability 

Access objects text. 

### Behavior actions

**Text**  
Change the text.

### Behavior conditions

**Text**  
Compare the text.

### Behavior expressions

| Expression | Description |  |
|-----|-----|-----|
| `Object.Text::Value()` | Return the text. ||
